divs: Sighting DetailsWitnessed what seemed to be something on fire in the sky which was surrounded by 3 smaller bright amber lights. All lights were solid. The center glow stopped shortly after witnessing and the small amber lights started rotating slowly around a point in the sky. Each light followed the same exact path. No sound was audible. Could not see any shape. Not sure what type of helicopter has no blinking lights and just a solitary amber light.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Smithtown
There were no other sightings in Smithtown on or around August 31st 2013
Summary: Glowing amber light surrounded by 3 smaller amber lights
